title: War in Ukraine: implications for the global financial system and central banks
description: The G7 and EU sanctions following Russia’s invasion of Ukraine are having major impact on the Russian economy and also have broader implications for the global financial system. In this episode of the Sound of Economics Live, Giuseppe Porcaro, Silvia Merler and Nicolas Véron take stock on lessons so far and prospects.
itunes:summary: A special episode of the Sound of Economics Live on the global financial system and central banks in the wake of sanctions imposed on Russia.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
